scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.backend:prod: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migrate:down: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m alembic downgrade base && python -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.setup:dev: cp .env.example .env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env.local
scripts.setup:prod: cp backend/.env.production backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.production frontend/.env.local
scripts.setup:project: npm run setup:dev && npm run install:all && npm run docker:up
scripts.deploy:check: npm run lint:frontend && npm run type-check:frontend && npm run test:all
scripts.deploy:build: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run deploy:check && npm run build:prod
